annotations.description: The Brooklyn Cocktail was inspired by it’s two cousins the Manhattan and the Bronx, two cocktail already established and named after neighboring NYC Boroughs...
annotations.title: Master The Classics: Brooklyn (Two Ways)

textContent:
2oz (60ml) Bonded Rye Whiskey
.75oz (22.5ml) Dry Vermouth
.25oz (7.5ml) Amaro CioCiaro
1 tsp Maraschino Liqueur

Stir and strain into coupe

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=d2_OVNW_KbM
title: Brooklyn
